backend/main.mo: Actor canister storing contact form submissions in a map, supporting submit, fetch-all, and fetch-by-name operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a typography text-shadow removal change and its related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text map of frontend file paths to their functional summaries for build analysis.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering build steps, verification checklists, known issues, rollback steps, and backend contact form notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router and defines routes for all main site pages within a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/common/Container: Simple layout wrapper providing consistent horizontal padding and max-width.
frontend/src/components/common/GradientB: Transparent structural wrapper component preserving spacing without gradient effects.
Reusable card component with optional icon, title, description, and content area.
frontend/src/components/common/ProfilePo: Rounded portrait component with ring, shadow, and gradient glow effects in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/common/ShareSite: UI card allowing users to copy or open the site URL with feedback state handling.
frontend/src/components/common/Waterfall: Renders static waterfall background and overlay elements for page backdrop.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, controlled inputs, and backend submission via custom hook.
frontend/src/components/contact/SubmitSt: Shows success or error alerts after a contact form submission based on isSuccess and isError flags.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero with name, tagline, description, and links to portfolio and contact pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Provides responsive site navigation with desktop buttons and a mobile sheet menu, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays the footer with branding, quick links, contact prompt, and dynamic copyright plus caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site with video background, header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Renders tab-based category filters for projects and triggers category changes.
Displays a responsive grid of project cards with titles, descriptions, tools, and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillCate: Shows a skill category card listing multiple skills with progress meters.
frontend/src/components/skills/SkillMete: Displays a skill name with a percentage level using a progress bar.
frontend/src/data/projects.ts: Defines the Project interface and exports a list of categorized project data with descriptions and tools.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing login state and identity.
Defines a React Query mutation hook that submits contact form data via the backend actor and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables, dark mode styles, utility classes, and background effects.
frontend/src/lib/emailValidation.ts: Exports a simple regex-based email validation function.
frontend/src/lib/portrait.ts: Defines centralized portrait image path and alt text for consistent usage.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Provides utilities to set document title and meta tags for SEO and Open Graph data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, portrait, bio content, and highlight cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with SEO setup, contact form, and contact information sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page and sets primary SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Displays a filterable project portfolio with SEO setup and category-based filtering.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with SEO setup, a list of service cards, and a CTA section using shared layout components.
frontend/src/pages/SkillsPage.tsx: Displays categorized skill groups with SEO setup, using SkillCategory components inside a structured layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for layout and UI styling.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the siteâ€™s requirements, theme changes, issues, and existing feature records.
